autoFocus.description: If `true`, the pin input receives focus on mount
autoFocus.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则 pin input 接收 mount 的焦点

colorScheme.type: whiteAlpha / blackAlpha / gray / red / orange / yellow / green / teal / blue / cyan / purple / pink
colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

defaultValue.description: The default value of the pin input

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid. Use color keys in `theme.colors`
errorBorderColor.description_zh: 输入无效时的边框颜色。在 'theme.colors' 中使用颜色键

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused. Use color keys in `theme.colors`
focusBorderColor.description_zh: 聚焦输入时的边框颜色。在 'theme.colors' 中使用颜色键

id.description:
The top-level id string that will be applied to the input fields.
The index of the input will be appended to this top-level id.
id.description_zh:
将应用于输入字段的顶级 id 字符串。
input 的索引将附加到此顶级 id。

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the pin input component is put in the disabled state
isDisabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则引脚输入组件处于禁用状态

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the pin input component is put in the invalid state
isInvalid.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则 pin input component 处于无效状态

manageFocus.description: If `true`, focus will move automatically to the next input once filled
manageFocus.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则填充后焦点将自动移动到下一个输入

mask.description: If `true`, the input's value will be masked just like `type=password`
mask.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则输入的值将被屏蔽，就像 'type=password' 一样

onChange.description_zh: 在输入更改时调用的函数

onComplete.description: Function called when all inputs have valid values
onComplete.description_zh: 当所有输入都具有有效值时调用的函数

otp.description:
If `true`, the pin input component signals to its fields that they should
use `autocomplete="one-time-code"`.
otp.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则引脚输入组件向其字段发出信号，表明它们应该
使用 'autocomplete=“one-time-code”'。

placeholder.description: The placeholder for the pin input

type.description: The type of values the pin-input should allow

value.description:
The value of the pin input. This is the value
that will be returned when the pin input is filled
value.description_zh:
pin input的值。这是 value
当 pin input 被填充时，将返回
